thread.title: Video: Bills' Rex Ryan, Men in Blazers sit down to discuss coach's entertaining personality
thread.title_full: Video: Bills' Rex Ryan, Men in Blazers sit down to discuss coach's entertaining personality | syracuse.com

author: Matthew Fairburn | mfairburn@syracuse.com
title: Video: Bills' Rex Ryan, Men in Blazers sit down to discuss coach's entertaining personality
text:
Orchard Park, N.Y. â€” Men in Blazers, a show on NBC Sports Network, is hosted by Michael Davis and Roger Bennett, two men who consider soccer to be America's sport of the future. With the NFL putting some games in London, however, the two hosts have crossed over to American football.
With the Buffalo Bills getting ready to play the Jacksonville Jaguars at Wembley Stadium in London on Oct. 25, Davis and Bennett sat down with Bills head coach Rex Ryan to discuss his entertaining personality and figure out just how real Buffalo's coach is.
"I am true to myself," Ryan said. "I think, regardless if it's a press conference, you know, whatever it is, that's just who I am. It's maybe not the way most people do things, but it's the way I need to."
Check out the entire interview below in which the Men in Blazers compare Ryan's truck to their own automobile, and much more.
